properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 2:50PM EST until February 8 at 6:08PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...Flood Warnings continues for the following locations along the New River in Virginia...

New River at Allisonia affecting Pulaski and Wythe Counties

New River At Radford affecting City of Radford...Montgomery and
Pulaski Counties

Several inches of rain fell across the region yesterday into
this morning. Excessive runoff continues across the region
resulting in minor to moderate flooding along the New River
and its tributaries.

The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the New River at Allisonia
* until Saturday evening.
* At 2 PM EST Friday the stage was 10.4 feet...and nearly steady.
* Flood Stage is 8.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast to
continue.
* Impact...at 10.0 feet...Water is several feet deep along portions
of Clarks Ferry Road..Route 653.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 10.6
feet on Feb 23 2019.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to noaa weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
